mapper.select: SELECT B.DEPT_CD, B.DEPT_NM FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN CONVERT(FLOAT,A.DEPT_CD)/100=(CONVERT(INT,SUBSTRING(A.DEPT_CD,1,2))) THEN A.DEPT_CD END DEPT_CD, CASE WHEN CONVERT(FLOAT,A.DEPT_CD)/100=(CONVERT(INT,SUBSTRING(A.DEPT_CD,1,2))) THEN A.DEPT_NM END DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 A WHERE A.DEPT_CD > 7400 AND A.DEPT_CD<8000) B WHERE B.DEPT_CD IS NOT NULL;

SELECT CASE WHEN (D.PJT_CD IS NOT NULL) THEN D.PJT_CD WHEN (D.PJT_CD IS NULL) THEN (C.PJT_CD + C.PJT_TYPE) END PJT_CD, C.PJT_NM FROM (SELECT A.PJT_CD, A.PJT_TYPE, A.SVC AS PJT_NM FROM T_PS1000 A UNION SELECT B.PJT_CD, B.PJT_TYPE, B.PJT_NM FROM T_PS3000 B WHERE B.PJT_CD <> '' ) C LEFT JOIN T_P11000 D ON C.PJT_CD = D.PJT_CD
WHERE (C.PJT_CD+C.PJT_TYPE) LIKE '%'+#{columnValue}+'%'
WHERE C.PJT_NM LIKE '%'+#{columnValue}+'%'
WHERE (C.PJT_CD+C.PJT_TYPE) LIKE '%%' AND C.PJT_NM LIKE '%%'

SELECT (A.PJT_CD+A.PJT_TYPE) AS PJT_CD, A.SVC AS PJT_NM, CASE A.ACT_STAT WHEN '1' THEN 'black' WHEN '2' THEN 'green' WHEN '3' THEN 'blue' WHEN '4' THEN 'magenta' WHEN '5' THEN 'red' END COLOR FROM T_PS1000 A INNER JOIN T_SC1010 B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_AC0300 E ON A.CUST_CD = E.CUST_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_HM1000 H ON A.EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO AND A.MARKET_MAN = H.EMP_NO AND A.DESIGN_MAN = H.EMP_NO AND A.PM_EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO AND A.INFO_EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T_PS9200 WHERE REG_YY=YEAR(CONVERT(DATE,#{DateYear}))) F ON A.CLASS_GBN = F.CLASS_GBN LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PS3000 G ON A.PJT_CD = G.PJT_CD WHERE A.ACT_STAT LIKE '%' + #{ACT_STAT} + '%' AND (A.PJT_CD+A.PJT_TYPE) LIKE '%' + #{PJT_CD} + '%' AND A.SVC LIKE '%' + #{PJT_NM} + '%' AND ISNULL(A.END_BIGO1,'') IN ('', ' ') AND ISNULL(G.END_GBN, '') != '22' AND G.CRT_DATE BETWEEN #{FIRSTDATE} AND #{ENDDATE} ORDER BY (CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.PJT_CD,1,2) < '70' THEN '20' + A.PJT_CD ELSE '19' + A.PJT_CD END )

SELECT A.EMP_NO, A.KOR_NM, B.SHORT_NM DEPT_NM, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'H' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.JIKGUP_CD) JIKGUP_NM FROM (SELECT * FROM T_HM1000 UNION SELECT* FROM T_HM1000_T) A, T_SC1010 B WHERE A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND
(SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'H' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = A.JIKGUP_CD) LIKE '%' + #{columnValue} + '%' AND
${column} LIKE '%' + #{columnValue} + '%' AND
(CASE WHEN A.OUT_DT ='' THEN '재직자' WHEN A.OUT_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '퇴직자' END) LIKE '%' + #{EMP_GB} + '%'
(CASE WHEN A.OUT_DT ='' THEN '재직자' WHEN A.OUT_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '퇴직자' END) LIKE '%' + #{EMP_GB} + '%'
ORDER BY EMP_NO

SELECT A.SEQ, A.JOB_STEP, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN COUNT(*) ELSE COUNT(*)-1 END FROM T_PS1050_H WHERE PRE_PJT_CD = A.PRE_PJT_CD AND SEQ = A.SEQ) UPD_COUNT, A.END_EXP_DATE, RTRIM(A.END_DATE) END_DATE, A.BIGO FROM T_PS1050 A WHERE A.PRE_PJT_CD LIKE '%' + #{PJT_CD} + '%'

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.LEVEL2_CD)) as NUM, B.LEVEL2_CD, B.LEVEL2_NM, C.INWON_1, C.MD_PLAN_1, C.INWON_2, C.MD_PLAN_2, C.INWON, ISNULL(A.MD_PLAN,'0') MD_PLAN, ISNULL(A.YEA_AMT,'0') YEA_AMT, C.BIGO FROM SF_P01_1210M_SL4 (#{PJT_CD},'','S') A RIGHT OUTER JOIN T_SC9100 B ON B.LEVEL2_CD = A.JIKGUP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PS1010 C ON B.LEVEL2_CD = C.JIKGUB WHERE B.LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND B.BUSI_GB = 'H' AND B.LEVEL2_CD > '130' AND B.LEVEL2_CD < '800' AND C.PRE_PJT_CD LIKE '%' + #{PJT_CD} + '%' ORDER BY B.LEVEL2_CD

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.COST_CD)) as NUM, ISNULL(A.PRE_PJT_CD, '20'+ #{PJT_CD}) PRE_PJT_CD, ISNULL(A.COST_CD , B.LEVEL2_CD) COST_CD, CASE A.COST_CD WHEN '021' THEN '시내교통비' WHEN '031' THEN '인지세' WHEN '051' THEN '교제비' WHEN '062' THEN '도서등록비' ELSE B.LEVEL2_NM END COST_NM, ISNULL(A.PJT_CD,'') PJT_CD, ISNULL(A.COST_AMT,0) COST_AMT, ISNULL(A.COST_CD,B.LEVEL2_CD) OLD_COST_CD, ISNULL(A.BIGO,'') BIGO, CASE SUBSTRING(B.REF2_NM,1,1) WHEN 'A' THEN 'red' ELSE '' END COLOR FROM T_PS1020 A, T_SC9100 B WHERE B.BUSI_GB = 'J' AND B.LEVEL1_CD = '180' AND SUBSTRING(B.REF2_NM,1,1) = 'A' AND ((ISNULL((SELECT CD_REG_DATE FROM T_PS1000 WHERE PRE_PJT_CD = '20'+ #{PJT_CD}),'20030000') < '20030000' AND B.LEVEL2_CD NOT IN ('081','012')) OR (ISNULL((SELECT CD_REG_DATE FROM T_PS1000 WHERE PRE_PJT_CD = '20'+ #{PJT_CD}),'20030000') >= '20030000' )) AND A.COST_CD =* B.LEVEL2_CD AND A.PRE_PJT_CD = '20'+ #{PJT_CD} ORDER BY COST_CD

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.COST_CD)) as NUM, ISNULL(A.PRE_PJT_CD, '20'+ #{PJT_CD}) PRE_PJT_CD, ISNULL(A.COST_CD, B.LEVEL2_CD) COST_CD, ISNULL(B.LEVEL2_NM, '') COST_NM, ISNULL(A.PJT_CD,'') PJT_CD, ISNULL(A.COST_AMT,0) COST_AMT, ISNULL(A.COST_CD,B.LEVEL2_CD) OLD_COST_CD, ISNULL(A.BIGO,'') BIGO, '' COLOR FROM T_PS1020 A, T_SC9100 B WHERE B.BUSI_GB = 'J' AND B.LEVEL1_CD = '180' AND (SUBSTRING(B.REF2_NM,1,1) <> 'A' OR B.LEVEL2_CD IN ('081','012')) AND ((ISNULL((SELECT CD_REG_DATE FROM T_PS1000 WHERE PRE_PJT_CD = '20'+ #{PJT_CD}),'20030000') < '20030000') OR (ISNULL((SELECT CD_REG_DATE FROM T_PS1000 WHERE PRE_PJT_CD = '20'+ #{PJT_CD}),'20030000') >= '20030000' AND B.LEVEL2_CD NOT IN ('081','012'))) AND A.PRE_PJT_CD = '20'+ #{PJT_CD} AND A.COST_CD =* B.LEVEL2_CD ORDER BY A.COST_CD

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ACC_CD)) as NUM,* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.ACC_CD, A.ACC_DTL_CD, A.ACC_LONG_NM, A.YEA_AMT, B.BIGO, CASE WHEN A.CHA_AMT < 0 THEN 'red' ELSE 'black' END COLOR FROM SF_P21_4100M_JEJO2 (#{PJT_CD},'','S') A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PS1030 B ON B.PRE_PJT_CD LIKE '%' + #{PJT_CD} + '%') C ORDER BY C.ACC_DTL_CD

SELECT PRE_PJT_CD AS PJT_CD, COST_AMT1 AS LABOR_COST, COST_AMT2 AS MANU_COST1, COST_AMT3 AS MANU_COST2, (COST_AMT1 + COST_AMT2 + COST_AMT3) AS SELF_SUM, DIV_AMT40 AS COMMON_COST1, DIV_AMT44 AS COMMON_COST_BU, (DIV_AMT41+DIV_AMT42) AS COMMON_COST_BON, (DIV_AMT45+DIV_AMT46) AS COMMON_COST_DEPT, DIV_AMT10 AS INDIREC_COST, DIV_AMT11 AS BUILDING_COST, DIV_AMT13 AS TELE_COST, DIV_AMT12 AS NET_COST, DIV_AMT20 AS COMMON_COST2, DIV_AMT30 AS MANAGE_COST, (DIV_AMT20 + DIV_AMT30+ DIV_AMT10 + DIV_AMT40) AS DIV_AMT, (COST_AMT1 + COST_AMT2 + COST_AMT3 + DIV_AMT20 + DIV_AMT30 + DIV_AMT10 + DIV_AMT40) AS COST_AMT FROM T_PS1090 A WHERE A.PRE_PJT_CD = '20'+ #{PJT_CD}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PS1000 SET A.ACT_STAT='2' WHERE PJT_CD LIKE '%' + #{PJT_CD} + '%'
